Pre-Game Insights: Malawi and Burundi are meeting after 37 years
Malawi is looking to make their AFCON tournament comeback
Burundi is making their second attempt to qualify for the competition
Burundi have won just once in five games but remain unbeaten in their last three
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is only the second official clash between the sides in history
Burundi have won just once in their last six games
Others: Malawi is ranked 126th in the world, while Burundi is 13 places adrift of them
In their last appearance, coming in 2021, the Flames reached the last 16 of the competition
Burundi overcame Seychelles 3-1 in a 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifier match on 11 June, which also ended a run of five consecutive games without a win
